thread.title: Russian envoy says UK spying claims about Skripals a 'big surprise'

title: Russian envoy says UK spying claims about Skripals a 'big surprise'
text:
Russian envoy says UK spying claims about Skripals a 'big surprise' 2:52pm EDT - 00:45 
Russia's ambassador to the UK says claims that Moscow had been spying on the Skripals for at least five years before they were attacked was a “big surprise.'' Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Russia's ambassador to the UK says claims that Moscow had been spying on the Skripals for at least five years before they were attacked was a “big surprise." Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2JGzkk5
